headline: BP: 5 Levers To Pull At The Investor Day
summary: Read here for 5 key strategies BP's management can use to boost value and address recent underperformance, from cost cuts to portfolio optimization.

headline: Chevron staffers absorb long-awaited layoffs as CEO pledges accountability
summary: During an internal town hall meeting last week, roughly 40,000 Chevron employees were shown a video touting the oil giant's success in Colorado as the largest oil and gas producer in the state. ...
